snippet: Advocates for the legalization of marijuana in Washington announced Monday that they had collected more than twice the signatures required to get a measure on the November ballot.
abstract: Advocates for the legalization of marijuana in Washington announce that they have turned in more than twice the signatures required to get the measure put on the November ballot.
lead_paragraph: Advocates for the legalization of marijuana in Washington announced Monday that they had collected more than twice the signatures required to get a measure on the November ballot.

headline.main: Group Promoting Referendum on Marijuana Submits Signatures
headline.print_headline: Group Promoting Referendum on Marijuana Submits Signatures
